title: Take back my all data from limfuimay@gmail.com
steps: Submit a data request to the email limfuimay@gmail.com.
Exploit the system to retrieve all data associated with the email.
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows an attacker to retrieve all data associated with a specific email address (limfuimay@gmail.com) by exploiting a flaw in the system's data handling or access control mechanisms.
reason: The attack involves a straightforward data request and exploitation, without requiring multiple components, subtle interactions, complex state manipulation, or novel logic. The steps are simple and do not involve intricate understanding of the system.
